meaningMnemonic: 華やか is "showy." Now we're doubling it, making it doubly showy. If you make something showy enough, it becomes <vocabulary>gorgeous</vocabulary>, but it also becomes pretty <vocabulary>flamboyant</vocabulary>. So, so, so flamboyant.
readingMnemonic: The reading comes from 華やか. Note the second はな becomes ばな, to be <reading>はなばな</reading>しい.
